channel.title: stat385 on Shuo Yan
channel.description: Recent content in stat385 on Shuo Yan

item.title: My progress on STAT385
item.description: I’m currently taking STAT385: Statistics Programming Methods We talked about some basic R data types, control flow, loops as well as plotting! setosa_iris = iris[iris$Species == 'setosa',] median(setosa_iris$Sepal.Width) hist(x = iris$Sepal.Length, main = "histogram of petal length", freq = FALSE, xlab = "petal length", border = "dodgerblue", breaks = seq(from = 4, to = 8, by = 0.2)) grid() The current project it to build a personal project, which is this one!
